```
#kubectl syntax
kubectl [command] [type] [name] [flags]
#Example – Command to get specification of a specific pod called 'my-pod' in yaml format
kubectl get pod my-pod -o=yaml
```

```
# Get current config
kubectl config view
```

```
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: my-nginx
spec:
  containers:
  - name: nginx
    image: nginx:1.14.2
    ports:
containerPort:80
```

```
kubectl run my-nginx –image=nginx
```

```
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: pod-hello-world-etl
spec:
  containers:
  - name: hello-world
    image: hello-world
    ports:
    - containerPort:8059
  - name: logs-analyzer
    image: custom-logs-analyzer:0.0.1
    ports:
    - containerPort:8058
```

```
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: my-deploy
  labels:
    app: nginx
spec:
  replicas: 3
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app:nginx
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: nginx
    spec:
      containers:
      - name: nginx
        image: nginx
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
```

```
kubectl create deployment my-deploy --image=nginx
kubectl scale –replicas=3 deployments/my-deploy
```

```
kubectl autoscale deployment my-deploy --cpu-percent=80 --min=5 --max=10
```

apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: StatefulSet
metadata:
  name: sample
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: nginx
  serviceName: nginx
  replicas: 3
  updateStrategy:
    type: RollingUpdate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: nginx
    spec:
      containers:
      - name: nginx
        image: ...
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
        volumeMounts:
        - name: nginx-stateful-volume
          mountPath: ...
  volumeClaimTemplates:
  - metadata:
      name: nginx-stateful-volume
      annotations:
        ...
    spec:
      accessModes: [ "ReadWriteOnce" ]
      resources:
        requests:
          storage: 1Gi

```
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: DaemonSet

  name: log-collector-daemon
  labels:
    app: daemon

  selector:

apiVersion: v1

```

```
#Syntax
kubectl create <cluster-type> NAME [--tcp=port:targetPort]
kubectl create service clusterip nginx --tcp=80:80
```

```

    nodePort: 30200
    port: 80
    targetPort: 8080
```

```
apiVersion: v1
kind: Service
metadata:
  name: my-service
spec:
  type: ExternalName
  externalName: hello.com
```

```
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: pod-node-anti-affinity
spec:
  containers:
  - name: my-pod
    image: nginx
  affinity:
    nodeAffinity:
      requiredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExecution:
        nodeSelectorTerms:
        - matchExpressions:
          - key: cpuPlatform
            operator: Not In
            values:
            - Skylake
            - Broadwell
```

```
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: my-pod
spec:
  containers:
  - name: nginx
    image: nginx
  nodeName: node01
```

```
# Taint a node
kubectl taint nodes node01 sky=blue:NoSchedule
```

```
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: my-pod
spec:
  containers:
  - name: nginx
    image: nginx
  tolerations:
  - key: "sky"
    value: "blue"
    operator: "Equal"
    effect: "NoSchedule"
```
